specifications.Dye Method: Dope Dye "Dope dye is a method where color is added before the yarn is formed, embedding pigments throughout the fiber. This creates deep, uniform color that resists fading over time. Fabrics made with dope-dyed yarns often show a chambray-like texture and a premium look."
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Activewear, Nylon Shorts
